channel.title: How do i make it so u need 99 to weild cape not lvl 99?
channel.description:
hey ive recently changed my max skill to lvl 99 and not 100 but i dont now how to change player weild requirments?
1] how do i make it so u need lvl 99 to weild skillcape not 100
2] in my slayer tower i have a monster called dark beast how i make it so you need 99 slayer att and not 100?

In client.java
